title: Vacancy Inspector Of Air Accidents Human

sections.heading: Summary
sections.content:
Vacancy: Inspector of Air Accidents (Human Factors). The Air Accidents Investigation Branch are recruiting an Inspector of Air Accidents (Human Factors)

Independent report: Air accident monthly bulletin November 2025. The AAIB Bulletin is a compilation of AAIB reports and is published on the second Thursday of the month.

AAIB investigation to Boeing 737-86N, G-NPTA. Loss of cabin pressurisation, approaching Edinburgh Airport, 17 May 2025

sections.heading: Context
sections.content: These developments affect aviation connectivity, airspace management, and surface access to airports. Readers interested in Scottish aviation heritage may find parallels in the industrial and operational history documented in our research volumes.
